item.title: St Mary's church, Kingston Deverill
item.description: Whilst much of the body of the church dates from a restoration by Manners and Gill in 1846, the tower is 15th-century. Pevsner described the stair-turret which rises above the parapet of the tower as 'suspicious', but it dates from at least 1817.
item.dc:creator: AlexC
